If it's your first time in Barcelona,...
...top of your list has to be the eccentric architecture of Antoni Gaudi.
Antoni Gaudi's extraordinary masterpiece is La Sagrada Familia.
Under construction since 1882, this one of a kind cathedral...
...isn't expected to be complete until at least 2026.
Even so, La Sagrada Familia is an awe-inspiring building,...
Inside, the cathedral is just as impressive.
Bright, spacious and surreal, it's unlike any other cathedral in the world.
